source.title: Spontaneous thought and the default network: functional-anatomic fractionation of the brain's default mode

confidence_rationale: Directly links DMN subsystems to spontaneous and internally directed cognition, supporting reflective replay structure.

mapping.source_claim_statement: Default-network subsystems show differential relationships to spontaneous thought and internal mentation.
mapping.ree_translation: Supports MECH-029 by backing structured internal replay lanes rather than a monolithic default mode process.
mapping.mapping_caveat: Functional-anatomic fractionation is descriptive; it does not directly define REE gating policies.
mapping.source_context: Human functional neuroimaging linking spontaneous cognition to DMN subsystems.

confidence_components.notes: Strong support for internal simulation architecture with subsystem differentiation.
